action.primary: Dispels Wind-Dampness and relaxes the sinews

indications: Hot Bi, especially cramping and stiffness

action.primary: Relaxes the sinews and unblocks the channels

indications: Redness, swelling, Heat and pain associated with traumatic injury

useCases: Lower back pain or pain in the joints and legs due to Wind-Damp Bi
Localized Heat, redness, swelling and pain due to traumatic injury

notes: It can be applied topically where there is injury to the sinews or bones.
